name: Blackjack In Space
description: Blackjack In Space presents players with a peaceful Blackjack gambling simulation that takes place in outer space! Experience the highs and the lows in real-time as you try to double your money on every single blackjack hand.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: Intel i3 Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 Series or Later. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
